import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'rbx/index.css'; import { Card, Button } from 'rbx'; const CartItem = ({ product, size, amount, removeFromCartFunc }) => { return (

{ 'Amount: ' + amount }

{ '$' + product.price + ' x ' + amount + ' = ' + amount * product.price}

 ) } export default CartItem;
